messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/02/2001 11:38:09 PM !!!First Boot!!!, damenz@yahoo.com ... A wonderful book -- you have to get it!  Today!! Story of an 11-yo boy and the
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/02/2001 11:38:09 PM !!!First Boot!!!, damenz@...
writes:


> what is The Number Devil?????
>

>

A wonderful book -- you have to get it! Today!!

Story of an 11-yo boy and the Devil he dreams of -- who takes him on math
(not arithmetic) adventures.

Worth paying retail for (and I don't do that often!).

Nance
